metaData.description: Pezeshk-Book is the country's comprehensive health and treatment platform. In this system, you can book online appointments with Pezeshk Book's member doctors, always have your electronic health records and medical history on your mobile phone, get consultations, and view information about nearby hospitals, pharmacies, and imaging centers. This intelligent system accompanies you even after your doctor's visit, guiding you through the treatment process according to the doctor’s prescription.

laboratory.title: Welcome to Pezeshk Book's Online Laboratory
laboratory.sub_title: All blood tests and COVID-19 tests with immediate result delivery
laboratory.description: Home testing is one of the new services offered by Pezeshk Book to help save time and costs. This service eliminates the need for physical presence in potentially contaminated laboratory environments. Users can register various blood tests, routine checkups, liver tests, thyroid tests, HPV, hepatitis, and HIV tests through Pezeshk Book and receive the results confidentially. Sampling is done at the user's home or workplace without any additional costs. Additionally, users can view their test results online through the website after sampling.

aboutUs.label: About Us
aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description:
The idea of Pezeshk Book was founded in 2018 by the founders, along with the efforts of a young and motivated team at Parallel Processing Aria Company.
                  Our first goal at Pezeshk Book is to create a healthy, peaceful, and joyful life. Based on this, we launched a network connecting patients with the healthcare community via the web. In the Pezeshk Book platform, medical services are offered online to everyone, including services such as:

services_list.text_consult: Online text consultation with specialist doctors
services_list.medical_services: One of the new services by Pezeshk Book is home testing.

aboutUs.footer_description:
All of these tests are conducted at home without transportation costs.
                  Today, with the trust of hundreds of specialist doctors in Pezeshk Book, we help register electronic medical records and, through online appointment booking, specialized consultations, reminders, patient registration, and new patient examinations, improve clinic efficiency and establish an online connection between the medical community and patients. Additionally, in collaboration with top laboratories approved by the Ministry of Health, we perform all tests at your home in the shortest time and at the lowest cost.
                  Our goal is to value and protect the patient's money, time, and health, ensuring they have the best experience using Pezeshk Book. We never forget that in pursuing our goal, we value users' trust and facilitate continuous communication between doctors, diagnostic centers, and patients.

meta.title: Frequently Asked Questions of Doctor Book

support.title: Contact and Support Number
support.sub_title: How can I contact Doctor Book support?
support.description: The Doctor Book support center will be available from 9 AM to 10 PM to assist you.

q_1.title: What is Doctor Book?
q_1.answer: Doctor Book is a comprehensive software solution for providing services in the health sector.

q_2.title: Which bank card should I use to pay for Doctor Book services?
q_2.answer: You can use any bank card that is a member of Shetab.

q_3.title: Is my payment made through a secure gateway?
q_3.answer: Yes, Doctor Book uses the gateways of Pasargad Bank and Saman Bank, and the Enamad symbol and the national license for virtual business of this organization can be viewed and verified at the bottom of this page.

q_1.title: How is the coordination and timing for sample collection for tests?
q_1.answer: If the test request is made between 8 AM and 8 PM, coordination for sending the sample collector to the location will be done daily and without holidays *within a maximum of 30 minutes* after the request is submitted, and sample collection will be conducted the same day. Requests outside this time frame will be followed up at 8 AM the next day.

q_2.title: Response time for all home tests
q_2.answer: All tests are conducted daily without holidays within 24 hours after sample collection.

q_3.title: How to request the cancellation of a home test?
q_3.answer: All tests taken can be canceled before coordination for the sample collector's presence (via phone or SMS), and the total amount paid will be returned to the user’s account or bank account within a maximum of one hour after the cancellation request is made. If canceled by the user after coordination for the sample collector's presence, the travel expenses will be deducted, and the remaining amount will be refunded.

q_1.title: How can I get a consultation from a consultant or doctor?
q_1.answer: By visiting the list of consultants, you can choose the desired consultant or doctor and send your question in text, image, or audio format.

q_2.title: In what form can I send my question?
q_2.answer: To receive consultation, you can send text, photos, and audio to the consultant or doctor.

q_3.title: When will the doctor or consultant respond to me?
q_3.answer: Doctors on Doctor Book have a maximum of 5 hours after the user's question to respond.

q_4.title: Does the 5-hour response time apply at all hours of the day?
q_4.answer: If a consultation is asked between midnight and 8 AM, the 5 hours will be calculated from 8 AM.

q_5.title: How can I know that the consultant has answered my question?
q_5.answer: Once the doctor or consultant sends the response to your question, you will be notified via SMS.

q_6.title: Can I send a radiology image? Are there specific conditions?
q_6.answer: The image must be placed on a glass that resembles a window, and light should be shone from behind to make the image clearer for the doctor.

q_1.title: How can I make an online appointment?
q_1.answer: From the homepage, click on Doctors and Centers to view the list of doctors. You can use various filters or search for the name of the doctor you want. Then click on appointment scheduling and view the doctor's working calendar. You can choose available times and proceed to book.

q_2.title: How can I be sure that my appointment has been registered?
q_2.answer: At the end of the appointment booking process, if the system displays a tracking code, you can be sure that your appointment has been registered. Keep the tracking code until the end of the visit and when you go to the office.

q_3.title: What will happen to my payment?
q_3.answer: The amount you pay for regular appointments is the same as the doctor's consultation fee. You will not pay any additional fees.

q_4.title: What is an emergency appointment?
q_4.answer: An emergency appointment, or 'between patients' as it is commonly known in doctors' offices, is managed by Doctor Book. If you need to see a doctor and all appointments are taken, you can apply for this type of appointment. In this type of appointment, depending on the case, there may be a slightly higher consultation fee that Doctor Book will receive as a fee. In this type of appointment, the waiting time is longer.

q_5.title: Can I cancel my appointment?
q_5.answer: Yes, you can cancel until 24 hours before the appointment time. This option is available in your user profile. The amount paid will be fully refunded to the user's account or bank account. In cases where the 24-hour window has passed, the amount will be credited to the doctor.

q_6.title: What happens if the secretary cancels?
q_6.answer: The payment will be refunded to your account. You can re-book an appointment.

q_7.title: Can I make an appointment for someone else?
q_7.answer: Yes, but you must register the person in the system. Avoid making appointments for others using your account.

form.policy_description: At PezeshkBook, one of our main priorities is protecting the privacy of visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains the types of information that PezeshkBook collects and records.
form.gathered_data_desc_1: Depending on the service you receive from PezeshkBook, various types of information are recorded, including your name, phone number, address, location, prescription details, requested drugs, national ID, electronic prescription tracking code, requested lab test information, and your medical query. The service process is designed to collect the minimum data necessary. PezeshkBook also collects information through cookies. A cookie is a file created at a website's request, allowing the site to save your visits and customize them. Most browsers allow users to disable cookies; refer to browser guides to learn how.
form.gathered_data_desc_2: It is important to emphasize that the responsibility for safeguarding one-time passwords and usernames or phone numbers is with the users. To prevent potential misuse, users should not disclose such information to others. If a user transfers their phone number to someone else, they should update their phone number in their profile to prevent potential misuse or issues.
form.gathered_data_desc_3: The user is responsible for any damages arising from non-compliance with the above, and the user waives any claims against PezeshkBook.
form.third_party_policy_desc_1: You can refer to this list to find the privacy policies for each service used by PezeshkBook.
form.third_party_policy_desc_2: Please note that PezeshkBook does not have access to or control over cookies used by third parties.
form.children_policy_desc_1: Another priority is adding protection for children when they use the internet. We encourage parents and guardians to observe, participate in, or monitor and guide their online activity.
form.children_policy_desc_2: PezeshkBook does not knowingly collect personal identification information from children under 13. If you believe your child has provided such information on our platform, please contact us so we can delete the information and block the account. It is important to note that PezeshkBook has no control over registering these users, and responsibility rests with parents in controlling their children's internet access.
form.satisfaction_desc_1: By receiving the login code and entering the PezeshkBook website or app, you agree to the terms and conditions above.
form.satisfaction_desc_2: If you have any other questions or need more information about our privacy policy, contact us via email at info@pezeshkbook.com.

how_to_buy.title: What is an online pharmacy and how to buy medicine online?
how_to_buy.desc_1: Do you still go to the pharmacy to buy your medicine? You will no longer need to do this with the Book Doctor online pharmacy, and you can simply leave your online purchase of medicine, supplements, and health items to us. From the past until now, people looked for pharmacies in hospitals and in the city to get the drugs prescribed by the doctor, and if there was no specific drug, they had to search the entire surrounding areas and the city to make their purchase.
how_to_buy.desc_2: Due to the spread of Corona and the use of online stores for the convenience and comfort of people and to reduce commuting, the specialized online pharmacy Mesikt Bok was launched, you just need to choose your desired medicine with a few simple clicks and
how_to_buy.desc_4: do the With the book online pharmacy, you will no longer have to leave the house to buy non-prescription drugs, stay in traffic, look for a parking space, or wait in line for hours at pharmacies, but with a few simple clicks, you can order medicine at home or at your workplace. Or register your desired product, then receive your requested product by courier.

video_tutorial.title: Training video for drug request:
video_tutorial.description: See the complete steps of how to buy medicine online (buying medicine with a prescription and without a prescription, etc.) This video has been prepared in order to facilitate and familiarize as many of you, dear users, as possible with how to use the services available in the application and the services of the Book Doctor website.

online_pharmacy_advantages.title: What are the benefits of buying medicine online from an online pharmacy?
online_pharmacy_advantages.desc_1: In the current state of use
online_pharmacy_advantages.desc_3:
As an ideal option for buying essential needs, using this online store has many advantages
                It can be safely said that its benefits will be more than buying in person. Some of the advantages of this online pharmacy include the following:

list.item_1: To know the exact price of the drug and its manufacturer
list.item_2: Buy all kinds of medicines and supplies needed instantly
list.item_3: The possibility of using insurance and online prescription
list.item_4: Simultaneous purchase of all cosmetics, health products and pharmaceutical items
list.item_5: Shopping at any time and place without staying in city traffic
list.item_6: The possibility of consultation and guidance by a specialist doctor online
list.item_7: Viewing and using the opinions and experiences of other people
list.item_8: Availability of support for follow-ups if necessary
list.item_9: Ordering medicine online from a specific company and brand

how_to_order.title: What are the methods of ordering and receiving medicine from the online pharmacy?
how_to_order.description: The online pharmacy is one of the new services provided by Book Doctor to those who wish to buy medicine, health items and supplements. In this service, users do not need to go to pharmacies in person to buy their medicine and can order their medicine, supplement or health items in three ways:

list.item_1: If you need to order an over-the-counter or OTC medicine, you can enter the name or photo of your medicine with the quantity and dosage and wait for the SMS from the pharmacy. This text message contains the price details and the payment link of the registered order. The announced price for your drug order is final and you will not pay any additional fees.
list.item_2: If you have a paper copy or an electronic copy has been issued to you, place your copy order in the copy upload section.
list.item_3: If you need hygiene items including shampoos, creams, toothbrushes, medical knee braces and wrist braces, sugar bars, or various pharmaceutical and sports supplements, including heroit, hirtamin, foreign and Iranian multivitamins, or... Register the relevant part of your order.
list.item_4: All the registered orders will be accepted by the online pharmacy as soon as possible and (after sending the confirmation SMS) the medicines will be sent to the people. So, wait for the SMS from the online pharmacy of Doctor Bok. If you were not able to receive SMS for any reason, contact support and follow up on your orders.

buttons.consult: Online consultation with a specialist doctor

order_steps.title: What is the registration process for buying medicine online?
order_steps.description: After selecting one of the selected options on the site to buy medicine and completing the requested information, the following message will be displayed. Your medicine order request has been registered in the doctor's book and within the next 30 minutes, you will be sent a text message asking for the cost and the payment link for the final registration of the order.

step_1.title: The first stage
step_1.description: Choosing the option to buy medicine

list.item_3: All medicinal supplements for men and women

order_able_drugs.title: Products that can be ordered through the pharmacy

what_to_know.title: The requirements that a patient should know when buying medicine from an online pharmacy
what_to_know.desc_1: All drug prescriptions will be checked by the pharmacy technician and the prescription will be sealed.
what_to_know.desc_2: The cost of medicines in the online pharmacy will not be any different from the cost you pay in person. After placing the medicine order, you will receive your prescription in the shortest time at the place you requested.
what_to_know.desc_3: If the medicine you requested is not available, Bok doctor will try to search all reputable pharmacies and send your medicine in the shortest possible time. So, if the acceptance text message is sent late from Bok's doctor, be patient.
what_to_know.desc_4: Do not worry about the expiration date of the medicine, all the medicines will be checked and sent by an expert before sending.
what_to_know.desc_5: All registered drug orders will be accepted by the online pharmacy as soon as possible and sent immediately.
what_to_know.desc_6: Book online pharmacy is currently serving in Tehran and soon the online pharmacy will be launched in the cities of Karaj, Shiraz, Tabriz, Qom, Isfahan and Mashhad.

how_to_find.title: Buying drugs online, how to read and search drug names
how_to_find.desc_1: Have you ever made a purchase request from an online pharmacy, but did not find the name or brand of the drug? Or is it a medicine with different names and you cannot find your medicine?
how_to_find.desc_2: In the science of pharmacology, drugs are divided into the following three groups:

item_1.title: Chemical name
item_1.desc_1: In specialized and scientific books in the field of medicine, chemical names are mostly used, the names of drugs are determined according to the chemical classification that is in the structure of each drug. For example, the drug acetaminophen is named N-4-hydroxyphenylacetamide.

item_2.title: Generic name
item_2.desc_1: Usually, we know most of the drugs by the same name and they are recognized all over the world. A generic name is registered on each drug package, for example, acetaminophen, which is a generic name, or aspirin, etc.

item_3.title: Brand name
item_3.desc_1: Drug manufacturing companies use the brand name of each drug or their own brand to differentiate their products from other competitors. For example, the widely used drug acetaminophen, which is used by most patients and is produced all over the world and in Iran under different trade names. Acetaminophen tablets with the brand name Kadimal are exclusive to the Obedi brand. Most doctors use this name in prescribing. Diphenhydramine syrup, which is used with the common names of diphenhydramine compound
item_3.desc_2: Discuss the issue with the doctor.

item_1.title: Test at home
item_1.description: Blood sampling and testing at home and at work

item_2.title: Online medical consultation
item_2.description: Text and audio conversation with a specialist doctor

item_3.title: Medical services on site
item_3.description: Nursing services and in-person doctor visits at home

item_1.question: How are the medicines purchased online shipped?
item_1.answer: All pharmacy orders will be quickly sent and delivered to the user after successful payment.

item_2.question: I don't have a prescription, how can I get medicine from a book doctor?
item_2.answer: If you do not have a prescription, you can register your order from the "non-prescription medicine" section.

item_3.question: When will the purchased drugs be sent?
item_3.answer: All the registered orders will be accepted by the online pharmacy as soon as possible and the prescription will be mailed, and after sending the payment confirmation SMS, the medicines will be sent to the people. You can also contact the support if necessary and follow up on your orders.

item_4.question: What is the form of inquiry about drug inventory in Doctor Bok?
item_4.answer: It is only possible to inquire about the stock and price of the medicine from the book doctor website. Your order will be sent to the nearest pharmacy. If your medicine is in short supply, the inventory of all the doctor's pharmacies will be checked.

item_5.question: What products are available in the online pharmacy of the book doctor?
item_5.answer: All foreign medicinal supplements, all kinds of valid foreign vaccines, sexual and sports products, vitamins for men and women, cosmetics and health products, medical and orthopedic equipment and all the medical needs of every patient are available in the Book Doctor Pharmacy.

item_6.question: Is the doctor Bok Darwab?
item_6.answer: Due to the large number of online pharmacies that are members of Book Doctor, your request will be sent to all pharmacies if there is no stock. So you will inquire about the inventory of more than 25 top online pharmacies in Tehran by placing an order in Book Doctor.

item_7.question: What is meant by electronic version?
item_7.answer: The prescription that the doctor registers for your national code is an electronic prescription.

item_8.question: Why is telephone inquiry not possible?
item_8.answer: Due to the large number of daily orders, the current inventory of pharmacies and the intelligent selection of the best pharmacy according to your address, this process will be presented to you users in a system with greater speed and quality.

item_9.question: How much does it cost to send medicine?
item_9.answer: 890 free and for other orders, it is similar to the price of Snap and Elo Pick.

medical.advantages_title: What are the advantages of receiving home medical services compared to visiting medical centers in person?
medical.advantages_description: During the spread of the Coronavirus and its various waves, it is better to minimize going out and being in public places. One of these places is clinics and laboratories. Therefore, it is better to stay at home or even at your workplace and perform various tests and examinations such as the Coronavirus test (PCR) including individual PCR test, organizational PCR test, airline PCR test, emergency Coronavirus test, antibody test, and various check-ups and routine monthly tests like pre-pregnancy tests, men's check-up, women's check-up over 40 years old, thyroid test, and so on.

meta.title: Home Laboratory Services – Blood Sampling and Instant Testing at Location
meta.description: The first and most comprehensive health and medical services platform in the country, offering home blood tests, COVID-19 testing on-site, HPV test, complete check-up with online and instant 12-hour results, approved by the Ministry of Health
meta.keywords: test, home testing, on-site testing, online testing

index.title: Bring Your Laboratory Services to Your Home and Workplace with Pezeshk Book
index.sub_title: Blood tests, men's and women's check-ups, COVID-19 testing at home or the workplace, with insurance and instant results

services.title: What are Home Testing Services?
services.desc_1: With Pezeshk Book's home testing service, you no longer need to visit a laboratory in person and waste time. Pezeshk Book offers this service at your desired location without any additional costs (sampling, transportation, etc.), following the Ministry of Health’s pricing. Simply submit your request on Pezeshk Book, and our experts will contact you to arrange a time. Your blood sample will be taken at home by trained specialists in the declared time frame in a safe environment, and the results will be uploaded online in your user panel. The original result will also be sent to you via SMS. You might wonder about the cost of home testing. With the option of using insurance services, you can directly request home testing with a picture of your prescription, an electronic version, or through an online consultation with Pezeshk Book. These services are provided by nurses and certified centers approved by the Ministry of Health and performed at your home or workplace while following all health protocols.
services.desc_2: Experts will visit your home in the shortest time and take blood and urine samples. After the sampling, the results of your tests can be viewed online through the website.
services.desc_3: Many people undergo regular check-ups to ensure their health and prevent illness. These check-ups can vary depending on the type of disease. Pezeshk Book aims to provide comfort for the elderly, individuals with physical problems, and those who value time, by offering medical services (home or workplace testing) online, especially during COVID-19 outbreaks. Disease treatment is always more expensive than prevention, and sometimes even the additional cost cannot make up for the delay in diagnosis.
services.desc_4: Therefore, it is better to stay at home or even at your workplace and have various tests done, such as COVID-19 PCR tests (individual, organizational, pre-flight PCR), urgent COVID-19 testing, antibody tests, and regular or monthly check-ups like pregnancy tests, children's tests, men's and women's check-ups, HPV tests, thyroid tests, etc.
services.sub_title: To use the on-site testing services, just place an order to benefit from all its services:

index.how_to_register_test: How to Request On-Site Testing through the Website:

result.title: Step Three
result.description: Results and Receiving the Test Outcome

tutorial.title: Instructional Video for Requesting a Test:
tutorial.desc_1: Watch the full tutorial video on how to request home testing and the steps involved until receiving results from the laboratory.
tutorial.desc_2: In this video tutorial, the usage of the Pezeshk Book app and website services is explained to facilitate and familiarize users with the process.

sampling_time.title: Coordination and Sampling Time
sampling_time.description: After placing your on-site test request and choosing the desired test, a sampling agent will arrive at your location within 30 minutes between 8 AM and 8 PM daily, including weekends. If your request is made outside of this time frame, it will be processed the following day at 8 AM.

result.title: Test Results
result.description: Blood and COVID-19 test results will be available online in your user panel 12 to 24 hours after sampling, depending on the test type, and the original result will be sent to you via SMS.

canceling.title: Cancel Request
canceling.description: If for any reason you need to cancel or postpone your home test, you can cancel your request before our experts contact you (via phone or SMS). The full cost will be refunded to your account or bank within one hour after the cancellation request. If the sampling appointment has been coordinated, transportation costs will be deducted, and the remaining amount will be refunded.

index.insurance: When submitting an online test request, you can upload your prescription and select your insurance type. The cost of home testing will be reduced depending on your insurance.
index.support: If submitting the request or completing the registration is difficult, you can call 02191004191 and register your request over the phone.

buttons.call_order: Phone Registration for Home and Workplace Testing

buttons.consult: Online Interpretation and Consultation for On-Site Test

recommended_service.title: Recommended Pezeshk Book Services for You
recommended_service.description: Our pharmacy or consultants and doctors are here to meet your needs.

consult.title: Online Medical Consultation
consult.sub_title: Text and Video Conversations with a Doctor

condition.title: Learn More About Home Testing and Its Conditions: Accuracy, Peace of Mind, Support
condition.description: The most important factor in online home testing is trust in the laboratories conducting the tests. Pezeshk Book collaborates with the top-grade 1 laboratories in the country for these services. For on-site sampling, certain standards are defined by the Ministry of Health of Iran, which must be strictly followed to ensure accurate sampling and reliable results.

requirements.title: Necessary Preparations Before Home Testing
requirements.description: To perform a home test, you must strictly adhere to all the conditions specified by the laboratory. Keep in mind that the conditions for each blood test vary. These conditions can include:

list.prolactin: Waking up 3 hours before sampling for prolactin test
list.cortisol: Sample collection for cortisol test at 8 AM

requirements.comply_requirements: All the above steps are to increase the accuracy of your test results, and you should fully comply with the laboratory’s instructions.
requirements.test_tip: Each test's conditions differ, so it is advised to read about the specific conditions for blood tests.
requirements.type_tip: Depending on the type of test, urine or stool sampling might also be required.

services_at_home.title: Home Testing Services at Doctor Book:

blood_test.title: Blood Tests at Home or Workplace
blood_test.description: Blood sampling at home is performed by experienced nurses according to the standards defined by the Ministry of Health and health protocols, allowing you to safely register this service for children or the elderly as well. During the sampling, the use of appropriate equipment and the timely transfer of samples to the laboratory will ensure the accuracy of the results, alleviating any concerns you may have.

list.title: Some of the blood tests conducted by Doctor Book include:

complete_checkup.title: Complete Checkup at Home
complete_checkup.description: Throughout our lives, we all need to check our health status periodically, as recommended by specialized and general practitioners. Comprehensive and periodic checkups should be performed at different intervals. To reduce potential costs and enhance the benefits of a complete checkup, it is recommended that individuals aged 30-50 undergo checkups annually. The complete checkup at home varies based on each individual and type of treatment, including blood tests, diabetes, liver, thyroid, etc. However, the issue of attending the laboratory arises. Doctor Book addresses this problem by sending specialized experts to the location while adhering to health protocols and using quality equipment for sampling. In most general health checkups, blood samples are required, and the results can be discussed with specialized physicians at Doctor Book or through online consultation. If you wish to perform a checkup at home, you can utilize our complete and specialized packages. These packages and their components have been designed by specialized physicians, and all items have been carefully selected so that users can benefit from all the services of each package by paying the minimum cost. In all blood test and checkup packages, sampling is free, and the costs present in each package are the final charges.

checkup_slider.title: What type of checkup do you need?
checkup_slider.sub_title: All medical checkups are performed at your home and workplace

monthly.title: Monthly Checkup
monthly.sub_title: In specific cases, based on the diagnosis of a specialist, individuals may need to undergo a monthly checkup. Usually, those undergoing treatment for a disease should utilize this method. They often do this upon a physician's recommendation. Cancer patients are included in this home checkup.

yearly.title: Yearly Checkup
yearly.sub_title: The elderly and children are groups that require special care due to their susceptibility to diseases, growth in children, etc. Everyone, given their living conditions and busy schedules, tends to neglect checkups and tests. It is advisable to know that annual blood checkups and certain care measures play a significant role in enhancing individual health. For instance, having a Pap smear test annually allows for quick detection and treatment if uterine cancer or other diseases arise.

elderly.title: Elderly Checkup
elderly.sub_title: Due to aging, elderly checkups are conducted at home for their convenience. In fact, through these checkups, they can prevent and control the progression of certain diseases and extend their lifespan.

sampling_at_work.title: Sampling at Your Home and Workplace

blood_test.title: Blood Sampling
blood_test.description: To diagnose various diseases, addictions, pregnancy, etc., sampling is necessary. Typically, sampling is performed at laboratories, but when attending the laboratory is not feasible due to reasons like traffic, preventing the transmission of viral diseases, inadequate transportation, or difficulty walking, there is a simpler solution. Blood sampling at home is carried out by experienced nurses, allowing you to safely register this service for children or the elderly. During the sampling, the use of appropriate equipment and the timely transfer of samples to the laboratory will ensure maximum accuracy of the results, alleviating any concerns you may have. If there is any reason for a retest or greater accuracy, it will be communicated by the laboratory.

list.title: Some other important tests by Doctor Book conducted at your location include:

question_1.question: How long does coordination and sampling take after registering for a home test?
question_1.answer: If the test request is registered between 8 AM and 8 PM, coordination for sending the sampler to the location will occur every day without holidays, within a maximum of 30 minutes after the request is registered, and sampling will be done on the same day if fasting is not required. Requests outside this time frame will be followed up at 8 AM the next day.

question_2.question: Is a medical prescription necessary for testing?
question_2.answer: If you choose from our diverse checkup panels, a doctor’s prescription is not required. If you have an electronic or paper prescription, upload it when registering the request and wait for a price inquiry SMS.

question_3.question: How many hours should I fast for blood tests?
question_3.answer: Usually, fasting for 8 to 12 hours is required for blood sugar tests and other checkups that necessitate fasting. All blood test packages at Doctor Book include complete information and can be reviewed in the 'More Information' section before registering the request. If you have the 'Triglycerides' item, it is advisable to fast for 12 to 14 hours. Additionally, fasting does not require discontinuing daily medications.

question_4.question: How reliable are the results of AIDS, hepatitis, and other sexually transmitted panels?
question_4.answer: For reliable results, a specific time should have passed since engaging in high-risk sexual activity. To ensure the appropriate testing time or the so-called window period, consult with our physicians online. For example, for AIDS, tests should be registered 18 days, 45 days, and 90 days after high-risk intercourse.

question_5.question: Are the test results valid and acceptable at medical centers?
question_5.answer: All laboratories collaborating with Doctor Book are among the top and most recognized laboratories approved by the Ministry of Health and licensed to perform laboratory services at home.

question_6.question: Which insurances cover the tests?
question_6.answer: If you have insurance and an electronic prescription, register it in the prescription upload section. The price will be provided after deducting the insurance rights. All prescriptions are covered under basic and supplementary insurance. In rare cases and specific prescriptions where tests are not covered by insurance, the free price will be announced.

question_7.question: How can I cancel my test?
question_7.answer: All tests scheduled can be canceled before coordinating the sampler's presence (by phone or SMS). The entire paid amount will be returned to the user's account or bank account within one hour of the cancellation request being announced. If canceled by the user after coordinating the sampler's presence, the transportation fee will be deducted, and the remaining amount will be returned.

question_8.question: Can I interpret the test results myself?
question_8.answer: Interpretation of tests is the responsibility of the physician. If needed, you can receive online consultations from our member doctors. Additionally, if medications are prescribed based on the test results, the online pharmacy of Doctor Book will deliver your medication to your home. For more information on blood test parameters, visit our health magazine.

corona_test.title: Corona Test at Home and Workplace
corona_test.description: Another service offered by Doctor Book is the Corona test at patients' homes and workplaces. Given the outbreak of Corona and recent events, if you need a Corona test and cannot visit a treatment facility or plan to travel, you can conduct the test at home to save time and take care of yourself and those around you. Depending on your needs, you can choose to have the Corona test conducted at your location.

hpv_test.title: Sexually Transmitted Disease Tests and HPV Test at Home
hpv_test.description:
One of the tests that is highly recommended today is the HPV test. HPV is an essential test for sexually active individuals.
            Why is HPV testing necessary?
            The HPV virus can be transmitted through various means, such as oral, anal, vaginal sex, and close skin-to-skin contact from an infected person to a healthy person. Sometimes individuals show symptoms of this disease, while at other times it is asymptomatic, making it easier to transmit to sexual partners. Note that having a genital warts infection is not at all similar to or comparable with diseases such as AIDS or herpes. Therefore, HPV infection is often treatable and manageable. Additionally, receiving the vaccine can significantly reduce the likelihood of contracting this disease. If you care about your physical and sexual health, be sure to take this test.

advantages.title: What are the advantages of home testing compared to visiting the laboratory in person?

list.health_protocols: All tests are conducted with full adherence to health protocols and under the supervision of a reputable laboratory near your location.
list.lowest_cost: You will incur the lowest costs for conducting tests at home.
list.pcr: All routine and checkup tests, PCR tests, antibody tests (airline antibody - immunity antibody), and emergency Corona tests can be booked through the website.
list.time: Save time and conduct all tests at your requested location.
list.result: You will receive your test results as quickly as possible and online.
list.risk: Minimize the risk of contracting Corona and exposure to crowded environments.
list.consult: If you are unsure which test is suitable for you, you can have an online consultation with the specialist doctors at Doctor Book right now.

consult.title: Interpretation and Online Consultation of Tests at Home
consult.sub_title: You may have experienced getting a test done and needing interpretation and parameter review. The specialists and doctors at Doctor Book have solved this issue for you online; you just need to click a few times to obtain accurate and sufficient information regarding your illness and consultation with a doctor.

test_cost.title: How will the cost of the test at home be?
test_cost.description: You can view the costs of tests and sampling at home in the online order section of the website. Before selecting the test, the cost will be displayed, and no additional charges will be applied. If any other services are added to your tests, it will be shown as a total in the pro forma, which can be paid through the bank portal after confirmation.

cities.title: In which cities in Iran are medical services provided:
cities.description: Currently, home testing and other medical services are available in the cities of Tehran, Karaj, Tabriz, and Qom. Doctor Book collaborates with prominent laboratories in each city to provide suitable services to individuals.
